item.description:
I have tee times reserved for 18-holes at Shaker Hills Golf Club at 11:50am for Saturday, August 13th. Reduced mid-morning rate of $69 includes cart and range balls. (no walking rates on weekends; no 9-hole rates until after 3pm)

I played here a few years ago and have been wanting to go back. From what I remember, it's a beautiful and very enjoyable course when conditions are good - worth the 45 to 55 minute drive from Boston and surrounding suburbs. Just off Rte. 495.

Received 4-star rating in 2011 New England Golf Guide.

For more course info and directions, visit

http://www.shakerhills.com/golf-at-shaker-hills

Please Note: I did have to use a credit card to reserve these tee times, so no-shows would have to be charged here.

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Shaker Hills Golf Club
